August 12, 2011 TriTech EMS Customer Advisory Board Applications Being Accepted
TriTech EMS is forming a Customer Advisory Board, and you have an opportunity to participate! The Customer Advisory Board will have the opportunity to provide input on TriTech products and services throughout the year.
Current plans for the Customer Advisory Board include: - Opportunities to review products and features under development - Opportunities to discuss service offerings - Bi-monthly meetings via web conference - Annual meeting to be conducted at the TriCON User conference
The Customer Advisory Board members will be selected from a pool of interested customers who submit applications to participate in the group. Please copy and paste this link into a web browser window to download the application: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/TriTech_EMS_CAB_Application.doc
To apply for group membership, fax your completed application to 563-387-9333 by August 18.
